SELECT cust_nm, cust_mbl_telno, cust_pridtf_no FROM kcgbd.e_customer where 1=1
and cust_nm like CONCAT('%',#{cust_nm},'%')
and cust_mbl_telno like CONCAT('%',#{cust_mbl_telno},'%')
and cust_pridtf_no like CONCAT('%',#{cust_pridtf_no},'%')
select cust_nm, cust_mbl_telno, cust_pridtf_no, cust_cr_no, TO_CHAR(cust_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cust_birth FROM kcgbd.e_customer where cust_cr_no = 'JB04'

select cust_nm, cust_mbl_telno, cust_pridtf_no, cust_cr_no, TO_CHAR(cust_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cust_birth FROM kcgbd.e_customer WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM AGE(CURRENT_DATE, cust_birth)) BETWEEN 19 AND 34

SELECT cu.cust_nm, cu.cust_mbl_telno, TO_CHAR(cu.cust_birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cust_birth, ee.emp_nm, sa.prod_nm AS sa_prod_nm, lo.prod_nm AS loan_prod_nm, ac.prod_nm AS ac_prod_nm, dp.prod_nm AS dp_prod_nm, sa.prod_type AS sa_prod_type, lo.prod_type AS loan_prod_type, ac.prod_type AS ac_prod_type, dp.prod_type AS dp_prod_type FROM kcgbd.e_product_init a LEFT JOIN kcgbd.e_customer cu ON a.cust_sn = cu.cust_sn LEFT JOIN kcgbd.e_employee ee ON a.emp_no = ee.emp_no LEFT JOIN kcgbd.e_product_save sa ON a.sa_prod_no = sa.prod_no LEFT JOIN kcgbd.e_product_loan lo ON a.loan_prod_no = lo.prod_no LEFT JOIN kcgbd.e_product_ac ac ON a.ac_prod_no = ac.prod_no LEFT JOIN kcgbd.e_product_dp dp ON a.dp_prod_no = dp.prod_no WHERE 1=1
AND cu.cust_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cust_nm}, '%')
AND cu.cust_birth = CAST(#{cust_birth} AS DATE)
AND cu.cust_mbl_telno LIKE CONCAT('%', #{cust_mbl_telno}, '%')
and ( sa.prod_nm like CONCAT('%', #{prod_nm}, '%') or lo.prod_nm like CONCAT('%', #{prod_nm}, '%') or dp.prod_nm like CONCAT('%', #{prod_nm}, '%') or ac.prod_nm like CONCAT('%', #{prod_nm}, '%') )

SELECT ee.emp_nm, COUNT(ee.emp_no) AS count, SUM(a.price) AS total_price FROM kcgbd.e_product_init a LEFT JOIN kcgbd.e_employee ee ON a.emp_no = ee.emp_no WHERE a.prod_type = #{prod_type} GROUP BY ee.emp_nm ORDER by total_price DESC, count DESC;
